author: Topsy
description:
Welcome to this month's recap! September on Tale of Painters was wild. We reviewed loads of new kits and products, inc. the Helsmiths of Hashut army set, had fantastic showcase posts like Stahly's Saturnine Dreadnought and a stunning Necron army, and more. So catch up now on what you've missed!

The post Best of: Tale of Painters September 2025 appeared first on Tale of Painters.
title: Best of: Tale of Painters September 2025
